==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|energy frame|8}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet">GenshinAcademy: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iLUT8Tafwih3RZbNlA59w6-x5NQdgPvsMc86b7W92DQ/edit#gid=0 Elemental Burst Frame Tests]</ref>
* {{TalentNote|cooldown frame|1}}<ref name="Genshin Academy burst info sheet" />
* This ability will drop up to 50 icicles over its duration, with each icicle targeting a random enemy that has not been targeted by the last 4 icicles.
